item.title: Michael Levy on Data Manipulation using dplyr
item.author: grixor@gmail.com (Trang Le)
item.description: *Editor's Note: This is a repost of [Michael's original post](http://www.michaellevy.name/blog/dplyr-data-manipulation-in-r-made-easy) at his own site.* Here is the dplyr talk that I recently gave to the Davis R Users' Group. dplyr is an R library that does basic data manipulation extremely well. It is designed to make the data handling tasks that we all do over and over as easy as possible. It produces highly readable syntax that is low cognitive overhead to write.
